prompts: Create a cute bird Pokemon that has round features and a green leafy design.
I want a Pokemon that resembles an owl, with a focus on its adorable eyes and fluffy feathers.
Generate a small grass-type creature that blends with nature and has a round body shape.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a mix between an owl and a plant, emphasizing its charming personality.
Imagine a starter Pokemon that is both an owl and a symbol of the forest.
Design a Pokemon with big expressive eyes and green wings, suitable for a calm forest environment.
Show me a whimsical bird Pokemon that loves to hide among trees and has a soft, friendly appearance.
